divs: Sighting DetailsJust a little after the pools closed at the Atlantis resort me and my wife were getting to know the facilities when we saw a very diferente looking object in the sky. We were just in front of the Cove Hotel around 7pm and there weren't maby people around specially because everything was closed.The object was norh of us above the sea.At first it looked like na airplane breaking the speed of sound but he pictures are very weird. We also asked and people told us that the army bases were very far away and in the opposite direction. We filmed also but it was very dark so I didn't attach it. Does anyone know what this could be..
trends: There have been no other sightings in Nassau
This sighting has never been favorited.
